summary: This mod replaces Crecy's scabbard with a brand new custom one.
descriptionHtml:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/MjWpAqW.jpg[/img][b]

INTRODUCTION & SUMMARY[/b]
Crecy is a custom sword made by billyro: it's a stunningly beautiful sword but in the original mod it comes with a scabbard that is a stretched out copy of the vanilla steel sword's scabbard and I feel that this takes away from the look of the sword. This mod is the result of my attempt to give this truly unique custom sword a fitting scabbard that matches its quality level. I don't know whether or not I have been successful in my endeavor but I know I gave it my all. In short what this mod does is replace Crecy's scabbard with a brand new custom one modelled and textured from scratch. To make it look pretty I've put some ornamental patterns on the leather.


[b]LIST OF FEATURES[/b]
-brand new custom and detailed scabbard made from scratch
-the scabbard works both for the two-handed and one-handed version of the sword (of course it has been fitted to match their size perfectly)
-two available versions: 4k compressed diffuse, 4k compressed specular and 4k uncompressed normal (this version provides the best look but it is very demanding); 4k compressed diffuse, 4k compressed specular and 2k uncompressed normal (this version looks very similar to the other one but it is better for performance and it is recommended for gameplay)


[b]IN-GAME INSTRUCTIONS[/b]
Nothing: just go in-game and Crecy will have a brand new scabbard!


[b]REQUIREMENTS[/b]
MANDATORY
-Skyrim
-[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65501]Crecy - Albion longsword v2.0 by billyro
[/url]

[b]INSTALLATION[/b]
MANAGER
1)install [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65501]Crecy - Albion longsword v2.0 by billyro[/url] with MO or NMM if you don't already have it installed
2)install this mod with MO or NMM and place it lower in the load order and make sure to overwrite everything when prompted
MANUAL
1)extract the files included in [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65501]Crecy - Albion longsword v2.0 by billyro[/url] in your Skyrim\Data folder if you don't already have it installed
2)extract the files included in this mod in your Skyrim\Data folder and make sure to overwrite everything when prompted


[b]COMPATIBILITY[/b]
This mod should be compatible with any other mod really...


[b]CHANGELOG[/b]
v1.1
-reduced the reflectiveness of the leather by remaking the specular and adding an alpha channel to the normal
v1.0
-initial release


[b]CREDITS[/b]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1734939]billyro [/url]for making Crecy and many other awesome weapon mods, for giving me advices and giving me the permission to publish this mod
Czano (myself, hehe) for making this mod


[b]PERMISSIONS[/b]
Ask me for permission before re-utilizing the assets contained in this mod in any other mods
This mod is a Nexus exclusive only and you are not allowed to publish it on any other platforms
This is a free mod, it shall not be sold under any circumstances
author: Czano
